law.catch_line: This section applies to the campaign finance entity of an individual if:...

text.section:
This section applies to the campaign finance entity of an individual if:
the individual is not a filed candidate or the incumbent in any office filled by an election under this article; and
the entity has funds remaining after the payment of all outstanding debts and other obligations.

A campaign finance entity shall terminate and file a final campaign finance report within 8 years after the latest of:
the end of the individual's most recent term of office;
the date of the election in which the individual last was a filed candidate; and
the payment of the final debt or other obligation of the entity that was incurred in connection with that candidacy.
